document_data.name: Ransaran's Sergeant-at-Arms
document_data.mainbody: '''Ransaran's Sergeant-at-Arms''' was a weapon's shop located in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Location: The shop was located along [[Duke's Way]] in central Daggerford abutting the landrise.
document_data.Activities: The shop's owner, [[Ransaran]], was a highly skilled weaponsmith who forged quality pieces. His prices were steep but most customers thought them fair considering the weapon quality.
